title: Annual license
context: §432:2-603 Annual license. Societies that are now authorized to transact business in this State may continue to transact business until August 16, 2016. The authority of societies and all societies hereafter issued a certificate of authority, may thereafter be extended in accordance with section 432:2-108. [L 1987, c 347, pt of §2; am L 1988, c 363, §2(7); am L 2012, c 251, §11; am L 2015, c 63, §15]
